comments:
This bug was originally reported as a WSAD 4.03 defect (Eclipse 1.0) from a 
customer seeking a patch.  After some investigation it seems that this is a 
problem in the eclipse platform involving the MultiPageEditorPart class.

If (or when) this problem is fixed, can someone tell me how I might provide 
this fix to a customer?  Would this fix be available from the eclipse.org?


This problem is consistently reproduceable using eclipse 1.0.  The problem 
involves the MultiPageEditorPart and affects any editor that is implemented 
using this class.  I've reproduced this problem below using the Multi-Page 
Editor Example.  BTW ... this problem no longer occurs in eclipse 2.0 so 
hopefully one could reuse the fix.

Steps to recreate : 

- create a Jave project with some arbitary Java files
- create a file called Test.mpe in the Java project
- open the file with "Multi-Page Editor Example" (keep the editor open)
- attempt to export the project to a jar file
- an "Create of JAR failed - Invalid Thread acces" message will result
- note that if the editor is closed before performing the export, everything 
works just fine


The following output is written to the .log file :

Log: Tue Sep 10 16:44:04 EDT 2002
4 org.eclipse.jdt.ui 566 Creation of JAR failed
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1708)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1642)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:368)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.checkWidget(Widget.java(Compiled 
Code))
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.getData(Widget.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart.getEditor
(MultiPageEditorPart.java:265)
	at org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart.isDirty
(MultiPageEditorPart.java:365)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.JavaPlugin.getDirtyEditors
(JavaPlugin.java:154)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.jarpackager.JarFileExportOperation.preconditionsOK
(JarFileExportOperation.java:455)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.jarpackager.JarFileExportOperation.singleRun
(JarFileExportOperation.java:611)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.jarpackager.JarFileExportOperation.run
(JarFileExportOperation.java:529)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)

This is a dup of bug 12996.

Not marking as a dup for now because I don't know what is the protocol in terms 
of sending bug fixes to customers.
Adding KH to the CC list to comment on that.

You need to persue this with the WSWB team. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 12996 ***
